problem: Analyze whether AI interview prep tools are a good startup idea in South Asia

subtasks.task: Conduct market research on the demand for interview prep tools in South Asia
subtasks.expected_output: A report on the current market size, growth potential, and target audience for interview prep tools in South Asia

subtasks.task: Analyze the competitive landscape of AI-powered interview prep tools in South Asia
subtasks.expected_output: A comprehensive list of existing AI interview prep tools in South Asia, their features, pricing, and market share

subtasks.task: Evaluate the technical feasibility of developing an AI interview prep tool tailored to the South Asian market
subtasks.expected_output: A technical feasibility report outlining the required infrastructure, development time, and potential technical challenges

subtasks.task: Assess the potential revenue streams and cost structure for an AI interview prep tool startup in South Asia
subtasks.expected_output: A detailed financial projection report including revenue streams, cost structure, and break-even analysis

subtasks.task: Validate the startup idea with potential customers and industry experts in South Asia
subtasks.expected_output: A validation report summarizing customer feedback, expert opinions, and usability testing results to confirm or refute the startup idea

rationale: This breakdown covers the essential aspects of evaluating a startup idea, including market research, competitive analysis, technical feasibility, financial viability, and validation with potential customers and experts. By dividing the task into these subtasks, we can ensure a comprehensive and data-driven approach to determining whether AI interview prep tools are a good startup idea in South Asia.
